metadata.title: Add prewarmed medium for vascular differentiation

materials.name: StemPro-34 SFM complete medium
materials.details: prewarmed (37 °C) including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2

annotations.instruction: Add prewarmed (37 °C) StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 to induce blood vessel differentiation.
